The 2024 APRECI Awards, presented by the Asociación Peruana de Prensa Cinematográfica, will take place at the Teatro Británico in Lima, on 8 February 2025, to recognize the best Peruvian film productions of the year.
The nominations were announced on 14 January 2025.
Nominees
The nominations are listed as follows:
